snippet: Brooklyn Nets guard Jeremy Lin is donating $1 million to Harvard that will help pay for renovation of the school's basketball arena and for undergraduate financial aid....
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn Nets guard Jeremy Lin is donating $1 million to Harvard that will help pay for renovation of the school's basketball arena and for undergraduate financial aid.

headline.main: Nets Guard Lin Donates $1 Million to Harvard
headline.print_headline: Nets Guard Lin Donates $1 Million to Harvard
